alert.note: Alert for Middlesex; Southeastern Burlington; Western Monmouth (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued October 01 at 5:08AM EDT until October 01 at 2:00PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 2 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Up to one foot of inundation above ground level in low- lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Tidal areas in the New Jersey counties of Middlesex, Monmouth, Ocean and southeastern Burlington. * WHEN...Until 2:00 PM this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At this level, flooding begins on the most vulnerable roads in coastal and bayside communities, and along inland tidal waterways. Some partial or full road closures are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Tidal departures and the astronomical high tide levels will be on the decrease during the new week. While some spotty minor tidal flooding remains possible on Monday, it should not be impactful enough to warrant another Coastal Flood Advisory. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Arthur Kill at Perth Amboy MLLW Categories - Minor 7.2 ft, Moderate 8.2 ft, Major 9.2 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.5 ft, Moderate 2.5 ft, Major 3.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- -------- 01/10 AM 8.0 2.3 1.2 Minor 01/10 PM 7.1 1.4 1.1 None 02/11 AM 7.4 1.7 0.9 Minor 02/11 PM 6.3 0.6 0.8 None 03/11 AM 7.0 1.3 0.8 None 04/12 AM 5.7 -0.0 0.6 None Sandy Hook Bay at Sandy Hook MLLW Categories - Minor 6.7 ft, Moderate 7.7 ft, Major 8.7 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.5 ft, Moderate 2.5 ft, Major 3.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- -------- 01/10 AM 7.3 2.1 1.1 Minor 01/10 PM 6.5 1.3 1.0 None 02/11 AM 6.8 1.6 0.8 Minor 02/11 PM 5.9 0.7 0.8 None 03/11 AM 6.4 1.2 0.7 None 04/12 AM 5.3 0.1 0.6 None Watson Creek at Manasquan MLLW Categories - Minor 5.7 ft, Moderate 6.7 ft, Major 7.7 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.3 ft, Moderate 2.3 ft, Major 3.3 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- -------- 01/09 AM 6.3 1.9 0.8 Minor 01/10 PM 5.5 1.1 0.5 None 02/10 AM 5.9 1.5 0.4 Minor 02/11 PM 4.9 0.5 0.3 None 03/11 AM 5.4 1.0 0.2 None 04/12 AM 4.4 -0.0 0.2 None Barnegat Bay at Barnegat Light MLLW Categories - Minor 3.5 ft, Moderate 4.5 ft, Major 5.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.0 ft, Moderate 2.0 ft, Major 3.0 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- -------- 01/09 AM 4.0 1.5 0.9 Minor 01/10 PM 3.2 0.7 0.5 None 02/10 AM 3.5 1.0 0.4 Minor 02/11 PM 2.9 0.4 0.4 None 03/11 AM 3.4 0.9 0.4 None 04/12 AM 2.6 0.1 0.3 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
